How to leave an iTunes rating and review for our podcast




Open the iTunes Store or App Store app.If you’re not signed in, sign in with your Apple ID.Search for “Gutenberg Changelog” in the upper right corner of the screen.Find the item that you want to review.There are three tabs: Details, Ratings and Reviews and Related.Tap Ratings and Reviews.Under iTunes Customer Reviews or App Store Customer Reviews, tap Write a Review.If prompted, enter your password.Select a star rating, enter a title for your comments, write your review, then tap Send.Your review might need to be approved before it’s published, so it might not appear immediately.
Let us know if you have questions, suggestions or news we should cover on the Gutenberg Changelog via email: changelog@gutenbergtimes.com
Subscribe to the Gutenberg Changelog podcast via your favorite podcast apps!🎙️ Spotify | Google | iTunes | PocketCasts | Stitcher |🎙️ Pod Bean | CastBox | Podchaser | RSS Feed
